_description: On the Vanity of Life — one 8-line stanza (abababab)

BLHar2316.First Lines: Kyndeli is now mi comingin to ȝis wiht teres and cry…
BLHar2316.Last Lines: …fowl and stinkande is mi rotingon me ihesu ȝow haue mercy
